Name: Helen Skipper, New York City Board of Corrections.
Title: Resolution approving the appointment of Helen Skipper as a member of the New York City Board of Corrections.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections
This Resolution was Introduced by Council
This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Resolution was Laid Over by Committee
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text: RESOLVED, Pursuant to New York City Charter ï¿½ 626, the Council approves the appointment of Helen Skipper as a member of the New York City Board of Corrections to serve the remainder of an unexpired six-year term that ends on October 12, 2026.
